content.raw: Yeah, I really don't understand that one.  Basically that (new) test is testing to ensure that if a NULL is passed into Converter::Convert(), it properly throws an exception.   I don't know why Windows is upset with that.  I'm going to disable that test for the moment, and try to re-enable when I get some time to look at it again.
